recommended_degree: Film Dan Televisi, Manajemen & Produksi Film Video & TV, Teknologi Multimedia Broadcasting (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in planning, shooting, and editing video content for social media, campaigns, product launches, and internal communication.
- Capture high-quality product, store, and lifestyle footage that aligns with brand image.
- Support creative brainstorming, storyboard creation, and concept development.
- Edit videos using editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut, CapCut) including color correction, sound, transitions, and effects.
- Collaborate with Marketing, Visual Merchandising, Advertising & Promotion, and other teams to produce effective visual content.
- Ensure all video materials are delivered on time and meet brand standards.
- Maintain and manage video equipment and digital asset files.
